installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Venice Unleashed installer
#
# This will just pull the latest VU server files and unpack it in directory.
apt update -y
dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl gnupg2 wget software-properties-common file unzip lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
## VU specific because reasons
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server/tmp
cd /tmp
## install latest wine
wget -nc https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/winehq.key
apt-key add winehq.key
echo "deb https://dl.winehq.org/wine-builds/debian/ buster main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
apt update
## install wine, cabextract, and xvfb for winetricks
apt install -y --install-recommends winehq-stable cabextract xvfb
export WINEPREFIX=/mnt/server/.wine
export WINEDLLOVERRIDES="mscoree,mshtml="
export DISPLAY=:0
export DISPLAY_WIDTH=1024
export DISPLAY_HEIGHT=768
export DISPLAY_DEPTH=16
export AUTO_UPDATE=1
export XVFB=1
## install winetricks
wget -q -O /usr/sbin/winetricks https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Winetricks/winetricks/master/src/winetricks \
&& chmod +x /usr/sbin/winetricks
## install vc redistributable
xvfb-run --auto-servernum winetricks -q vcrun2019
## Make VU Required Directories
cd /
mkdir -p /mnt/server/bf3
mkdir -p /mnt/server/vu/client
mkdir -p /mnt/server/vu/instance
cd /mnt/server/vu/client
# Validate and Download VU Server files
if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then
if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
echo -e "link is valid. setting download link to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_URL}
else
echo -e "link is invalid closing out"
exit 2
fi
fi
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
# unpack servver files
FILETYPE=$(file -F ',' ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} | cut -d',' -f2 | cut -d' ' -f2)
if [ "$FILETYPE" == "gzip" ]; then
tar xzvf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
elif [ "$FILETYPE" == "Zip" ]; then
unzip ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
elif [ "$FILETYPE" == "XZ" ]; then
tar xvf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
else
echo -e "unknown filetype. Exiting"
exit 2
fi
